title: New Admin Registration
subtitle: Register and assign a position with predefined roles into the system

adminTypes.label: Unit Leader
adminTypes.description: Unit Leader responsible for managing the batches. Has manage access to batches, schedules, students, teachers, assessments

adminTypes.label: Secretary
adminTypes.description: Secretary responsible for managing the batches. Has manage access to students, guardians, teachers, schedules

adminTypes.label: Principal
adminTypes.description: Principal has access to all resources in the system. Can view, update and delete all resources
